data.title: Na’Ima B Robert: Heartbreak
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Sharing with Kat Aziz on Spotify. Na’ima B Robert is an author of multicultural literature and founding editor of the UK-based Muslim women’s publication, SISTERS Magazine.  Everyone of us has a powerful, compelling story to share. However not everyone realise the intention and commitment that might already be in us.  Everyone of us will experience heartbreak. If you have overcome obstacles and difficulties and the beaten odds, you should Write A Book.
